verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: the U.S. will pull out of the landmark nuclear accord with Iran , dealing a profound blow to U.S. allies] .
President Donald Trump announced the U.S. [V: will] pull out of the landmark nuclear accord with Iran , dealing a profound blow to U.S. allies .
President Donald Trump announced [ARG0: the U.S.] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: pull] out [ARG1: of the landmark nuclear accord with Iran] , [ARGM-ADV: dealing a profound blow to U.S. allies] .
